import asyncio
from datetime import datetime
from decimal import Decimal
from sqlalchemy import select
from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import create_async_engine, AsyncSession
from sqlalchemy.orm import sessionmaker
from src.models.market_price import MarketPrice
from src.models.base import Base
from src.signals.generator import SignalGenerator

async def test\(\):
    # Create test DB
    engine = create_async_engine\("sqlite+aiosqlite:///:memory:"\)
    async with engine.begin\(\) as conn:
        await conn.run_sync\(MarketPrice.__table__.create\)
    
    factory = sessionmaker\(engine, class_=AsyncSession\)
    
    # Add test data
    async with factory\(\) as session:
        session.add\(MarketPrice\(
            card_id="sv1-test-001",
            source="justtcg",
            price_usd=Decimal\("60.00"\),
            price_eur=Decimal\("54.00"\),
            condition="NM",
            last_updated=datetime.utcnow\(\),
        \)\)
        await session.commit\(\)
    
    # Run generator
    gen = SignalGenerator\(factory\)
    signals = await gen.scan_for_signals\(\)
    
    print\(f"[SUCCESS] Generated {len\(signals\)} signals"\)
    if signals:
        s = signals[0]
        print\(f"  Card: {s['card_id']}"\)
        print\(f"  Profit: ${s['p_real']:.2f}"\)
        print\(f"  Velocity: {s['velocity_tier']}"\)
        print\(f"  Headache Tier: {s['headache_tier']}"\)
        print\(f"  Has audit_snapshot: {'audit_snapshot' in s}"\)

asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
PYEOF)

from datetime import date
from decimal import Decimal
from src.engine.maturity import calculate_maturity_decay, apply_maturity_penalty_with_reprint_rumor
from src.engine.rotation import check_rotation_risk, get_mark_distance_from_current

# Test maturity
decay = calculate_maturity_decay\(date\(2026, 2, 22\), date\(2026, 2, 22\)\)
print\(f"[OK] Maturity fresh set: {decay} == 1.0"\)

decay_with_rumor = apply_maturity_penalty_with_reprint_rumor\(
    Decimal\("0.8"\), date\(2026, 1, 1\), True, date\(2026, 2, 22\)
\)
print\(f"[OK] Maturity with reprint penalty: {decay_with_rumor}"\)

# Test rotation
result = check_rotation_risk\("H", "Standard", date\(2026, 2, 22\)\)
print\(f"[OK] Rotation H mark: {result['risk_level']}"\)

result_g = check_rotation_risk\("G", "Standard", date\(2026, 2, 22\)\)
print\(f"[OK] Rotation G mark today: {result_g['risk_level']} \(days={result_g.get\('days_until_rotation', 'N/A'\)}\)"\)

distance = get_mark_distance_from_current\("G"\)
print\(f"[OK] Mark distance G: {distance}"\)

print\("[OK] All imports and functions work!"\)
PYEOF)
